name: Poor Mans FPS
description: Poor Mans FPS is a class based multiplayer first person shooter built using Unity and Photon Networking. The game currently has 5 classes, each having their own abilities, weapons, and stats. Enjoy playing with, or against (we don't judge) your friends in Team Death match, or Free For All. And to top it all off, you can fight them in the different maps the game has.
